description:
The description of the option "compute_driver" should include hyperv.HyperVDriver along with the other supported drivers

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/aa018a718654b5f868c1226a6db7630751613d92/nova/virt/driver.py#L35-L38
title: The compute_driver option description does not include the Hyper-V driver

comments.content:
